alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Broadwater, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and northern Gallatin Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Harrison to 18 miles southwest of Bozeman. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Harrison, Norris, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Church Hill, Willow Creek and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 264 and 308. Highway 12 between mile markers 106 and 109. Highway 191 between mile markers 68 and 87. Highway 287 between mile markers 59 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
